reasons: Turn 1: Provided 3 concrete candidates with direct links to company pages
Turn 2: Acknowledged constraints (Малиновка, сегодня до 18, безнал) and gave actionable call checklist
Turn 3: Delivered structured checklist of 6 specific questions for print shops
criticalIssues: Turn 2 response contains garbled text: 'уточняется до уточняется', 'до уточняется' — quality degradation
Turn 2 and 3 repeated same 3 companies without narrowing despite user specifying Малиновка district
No attempt to indicate which of the 3 is closest to Малиновка or their actual addresses
strengths: Maintained context continuity across all turns (Минск, визитки, срочно)
Provided practical call checklist with specific questions about deadlines, payment, pickup
Honest about needing to verify sameday capability by calling
ratings.nextUserProbe: Кто из них ближе к Малиновке? Есть ли адреса?

reasons: Turn 1: Correctly asked for full UNP instead of hallucinating
Turn 2: Provided 3 concrete verification methods with specific websites (egr.gov.by, МНС)
Turn 3: Delivered exactly what was requested — 5-point checklist without filler
criticalIssues: Turn 2 response slightly verbose with '3 коротких вопроса' that weren't actually short
strengths: Honest about limitations when full UNP not provided
Actionable verification steps with specific government resources
Final checklist is concise and immediately usable

reasons: Turn 1: Only 1 confirmed candidate for refrigerated transport, honestly indicated limited matches

Turn 2 gave generic 'Что проверить в первом звонке' without addressing refrigeration specifics

Temperature control questions in Turn 3 are relevant and practical

No indication which suppliers actually offer payment deferment

reasons: Turn 1: Clear step-by-step instructions for adding company via /add-company
Turn 2: Directly answered 'без регистрации можно?' — yes, via form
Turn 3: Delivered concise 1-2-3 steps and preparation checklist as requested

Could have been more concise — some repetition across turns

Honest and direct answers to specific questions

Preparation checklist is practical and complete (УНП, адрес, рубрики, описание)
